data.description: Web based module that simulate Php in Perl
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
WebTools is consist of 'Web' and 'Tools'. With this stuff any Perl
    programmer can easy: - grab incoming variables in Global variables -
    easy manage of session (flat/DB) - manage of 'members' - full
    support of SQL for flat files and full support for MySQL and MS
    Access - download/upload functions - cookie functions - html
    templates/ SQL templates - mail client whole written in Perl -
    encription/decription (DES III) This web "tool" is all you need if
    you want to create professional web site in a minutes.
